preface.title: Foreword: ${project.version}
preface.para: This is an initial pre-alpha version of the Maven Handbook, and I mean "pre-alpha". If you are coming to the book with the expectation that this is a polished product, please check back in a few months, we're going to be developing this content over the next few months, and you should expect at least two chapters a month for the next five or six. I'm convinced that this will be a better book because people are going to have a window into the process, you will be able to see the false starts, outline revisions, and other parts of the writing process that are usually hidden from view. You'll be able to give us feedback and reviews even before we've stated that the content is ready for review.

And another thing, we're calling this thing a "book", but doesn't the term seem a bit archaic at the moment? This book is more of a periodical (as are most of our books), they change and evolve as the community and software evolves. Admittedly, parts of our other books tend to converge to a stable point, but even the most basic parts of Maven: The Definitive Guide are open to change. Despite this constant evolution, we are currently investigating new ways to make this content available as a regular, printed book for those of you who would like a copy.
